sentences.sContent: She had finished the vegetables and was garnishing the roast.
sentences.sCn: 她已经做好了蔬菜，正给烤肉配饰菜。

synos.tran: 为增加色香味而添加的配菜；[建]装饰品

remMethod.val: 利用废物 (rubbish) 装饰 (garnish) 房间 → 装饰

words.tran: 炫耀的；过分装饰的；过分鲜艳的

trans.tranOther: to add something to food in order to decorate it

trans.tranCn: 为增加色香味而添加的配菜；装饰品
trans.tranOther: a small amount of food such as salad or fruit that you place on food to decorate it
